sec.p: In total, we collected 330 usable plasma samples (152♂, 178♀) from adult wild and captive A. yniphora. Of those, we collected 125 samples (61♂, 64♀) from wild ploughshares in 2013 and 2015, representing 54 individuals (26♂, 28♀); 165 samples (78♂, 87♀) from captive ploughshares representing 39 individuals (17♂, 22♀) housed near their native range in Madagascar between 2013 and 2015; and 40 samples (13♂, 27♀) from the single adult male and the two adult female ploughshares housed in California, USA throughout the course of the study (2013, 2014, and 2015).
